SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client

Class Client

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientHandlerInterface, ClientRMIInterface, Serializable, Runnable, Remote
Direct Known Subclasses:
RMIClient, SocketClient
public abstract class Client extends UnicastRemoteObject implements ClientRMIInterface, Runnable
Abstract class representing a client in the network. This class is responsible for handling client-side operations and interactions with the server. It provides methods for creating and joining games, setting up the game state, and handling game events.
See Also:

      public abstract Game createGame(String username, int numberOfPlayers) throws ServerDisconnectedException
      Creates a new game.
      Parameters:

      the created game.
      Throws:
      ServerDisconnectedException - if the server is disconnected.

    • joinGame

      public abstract Game joinGame(int gameId, String username) throws ServerDisconnectedException, NotExistingPlayerException, RemoteException, GameNotFoundException
      Joins a game.
      Parameters:
      gameId - the ID of the game to join.
      username - the username of the player joining the game.
      Returns:
      the joined game.
      Throws:
      ServerDisconnectedException - if the server is disconnected.
      NotExistingPlayerException - if the player does not exist.
      RemoteException - if a network error occurs.
      GameNotFoundException - if the game is not found.

      Ends the turn for the client.
      Parameters:
      gameId - the ID of the game.
      username - the username of the client.
      Throws:

      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
      ServerDisconnectedException - if the server is disconnected.

    • drawCard

      public abstract void drawCard(int gameId, String username, CardType cardType, DrawPosition drawPosition) throws NotExistingPlayerException, NotTurnException, IOException, AlreadyThreeCardsInHandException, DeckIsEmptyException, ServerDisconnectedException
      Draws a card for the client.
      Parameters:
      gameId - the ID of the game.
      username - the username of the client.
      cardType - the type of the card to be drawn.
      drawPosition - the position from where the card should be drawn.
      Throws:
      NotExistingPlayerException - if the player does not exist.
      NotTurnException - if it's not the client's turn.
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
      AlreadyThreeCardsInHandException - if the client already has three cards in hand.
      DeckIsEmptyException - if the deck is empty.
      ServerDisconnectedException - if the server is disconnected.

    • playCard

      public abstract Player playCard(int gameId, String username, PlayableCard cardOnBoard, PlayableCard card, AngleOrientation orientation) throws InvalidCardPositionException, NotExistingPlayerException, NotTurnException, RequirementsNotMetException, CardTypeMismatchException, IOException, AngleAlreadyLinkedException, ServerDisconnectedException
      Plays a card for the client.
      Parameters:
      gameId - the ID of the game.
      username - the username of the client.
      cardOnBoard - the card on the board.
      card - the card to be played.
      orientation - the orientation of the card to be played.
      Returns:
      the player who played the card.
      Throws:
      InvalidCardPositionException - if the card position is invalid.
      NotExistingPlayerException - if the player does not exist.
      NotTurnException - if it's not the client's turn.
      RequirementsNotMetException - if the requirements are not met.
      CardTypeMismatchException - if the card type does not match.
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
      AngleAlreadyLinkedException - if the angle is already linked.
      ServerDisconnectedException - if the server is disconnected.
